title: Create Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Have a go-to page where I can control my application
soThat: I can easily and quickly access different functions of my app
acceptanceCriteria: The page has been created in UI Builder under the U&I Conference notes Workspace experience

title: Create page layout for Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Have an easy and intuitive user interface and page layout
soThat: I can navigate the page and functions of this application without frustration or hindrances
acceptanceCriteria: Create a page layout that is easy to use, feel free to get as creative as you'd like. You can do as much design or as little design as you want.
hints:
• It is recommended that for the fields you will be creating on this page in the following stories, you don't use the "Form" component. Instead, use input field components of the appropriate type. It will require you to create more configuration for all of that to work how you want it to work, but the Form component is more complex to use for this use case.
  • You might end up trying to use the Form component to do this, and that's ok! Give it a shot and figure out how it works, it's still a valid way to execute on this story. But if you get stuck, just go back to the previously suggested approach.

title: Add "Name" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Fill in fields on a form
soThat: I can enter the contact's name
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Name" field (string, required).

title: Add "Email" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add an "Email" field to the form
soThat: I can enter the contact's email address
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes an "Email" field (string, required, with email format validation).

title: Add "Note" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Note" field to the form
soThat: I can enter notes about the contact
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Note" field (string, required).

title: Add "Phone Number" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Phone Number" field to the form
soThat: I can enter the contact's phone number
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Phone Number" field (string).

title: Add "Job Title" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Job Title" field to the form
soThat: I can enter the contact's job title
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Job Title" field (string).

title: Add "Company/Organization" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Company/Organization" field to the form
soThat: I can enter the contact's company name
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Company/Organization" field (string).

title: Add "Conference Session Attended" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Conference Session Attended" field to the form
soThat: I can enter the session the contact attended
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Conference Session Attended" field (string).

title: Add "Follow-Up Action" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Follow-Up Action" field to the form
soThat: I can enter follow-up actions with the contact
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Follow-Up Action" field (string).

title: Add "Date/Time Met" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Date/Time Met" field to the form
soThat: I can enter the date/time the contact was met
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Date/Time Met" field (date/time).

title: Add "Tags/Interests" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Tags/Interests" field to the form
soThat: I can enter tags or interests of the contact
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Tags/Interests" field (string).

title: Add "Photo" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Photo" field to the form
soThat: I can upload a photo or business card image
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Photo" field (attachment).

title: Add "Location Met" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add a "Location Met" field to the form
soThat: I can enter the location where the contact was met
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes a "Location Met" field (string).

title: Add "Event Role" Field to Form Entry Page
iWantTo: Add an "Event Role" field to the form
soThat: I can enter the event role of the contact
acceptanceCriteria: The form entry page includes an "Event Role" field (string).
